NSPrivacyManifest.NSPrivacyTrackingUsageDescription: This app does not track users across apps and websites.

NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeEmailAddress: Email addresses are collected to create user accounts, enable app functionality, and provide customer support. Users can delete their accounts and associated data at any time.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeName: Names are collected to personalize the user experience and identify pet owners in shared accounts.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypePhoneNumber: Phone numbers may be collected for account verification, emergency contacts, and customer support purposes.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypePreciseLocatio: Precise location data is used to track pets, set up safe zones, send location-based alerts, and provide nearby services. Location data is processed locally when possible and encrypted during transmission.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeCoarseLocation: Approximate location may be used to provide regional services and improve app functionality without compromising privacy.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypePhotos: Pet photos are stored to create profiles and help identify pets. Photos are encrypted and stored securely in our cloud infrastructure.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeHealthAndFitne: Pet health and fitness data including weight, medical records, and activity levels are collected to help users track their pets' wellbeing and health trends.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageData: Anonymous usage data helps us understand how the app is used and improve functionality. This data is not linked to individual users.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeCrashData: Crash reports help us identify and fix bugs to improve app stability. These reports contain no personal information.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypePerformanceDat: Performance metrics help us optimize the app's speed and efficiency. This data is anonymous and not linked to users.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeOtherDiagnosti: Diagnostic information helps us troubleshoot issues and improve app reliability. This data is anonymized.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeDeviceID: Device identifiers are used for app functionality, analytics, and to prevent fraud. These identifiers are not used for tracking across apps.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUserID: User IDs are used to associate data with user accounts and enable multi-device synchronization.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypePurchaseHistor: Purchase history is used to manage subscriptions, provide customer support, and enable features based on subscription status.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeCustomerInfo: Customer information including emergency contacts and veterinarian details are stored to provide comprehensive pet care coordination and emergency response capabilities.
NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeUsageDescripti.NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypeSearchHistory: Search history for nearby pet services (veterinarians, groomers, pet stores) is stored to provide personalized recommendations and improve location-based service suggestions.
